Monkey Zombies are encountered during Monkey Madness I in the Ape Atoll Dungeon. They drop Monkey bones that are needed to make a Zombie greegree. They appear to be green undead monkeys.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Training
  • 3 Drops
    • 3.1 100%
    • 3.2 Tertiary

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Ape Atoll Dungeon9830Maplink
Temple of Marimbo Dungeon82, 98*, 12941Maplink

*Accessible only after Hard Western Provinces Diary completion

Training[edit | edit source]

If you have a high enough Prayer and combat level, these monsters can be used for training. One can get around 100,000 experience per hour at higher levels. Use prayer, and when you are out run upstairs and use the altar to the north-west. Make sure, however, to become a monkey using a greegree or you will be trapped by the Monkey guards up the ladder. An alternative to using the upstairs altar would be to bring prayer-boosting gear and use prayer potions. Remember to bring salve amulet or salve amulet (e), as they are undead.

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Small zombie monkey bones1Always[d 1]Not sold0
Large zombie monkey bones1Always[d 2]Not sold0
  1. ↑ Small zombie bones are only dropped by the level 82 variant.
  2. ↑ Large zombie bones are only dropped by the level 98 and 129 variants.

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Monkey paw1Always[d 1]Not soldN/A
  1. ↑ Monkey paws are only droped during Rag and Bone Man I.

[[File:Monkey Zombie chathead.png|left]]
'''Monkey Zombies''' are encountered during [[Monkey Madness I]] in the [[Ape Atoll Dungeon]]. They drop [[Monkey bones]] that are needed to make a [[Zombie greegree]]. They appear to be green undead monkeys.

==Training==
If you have a high enough [[Prayer]] and combat level, these monsters can be used for training. One can get around 100,000 experience per hour at higher levels. Use prayer, and when you are out run upstairs and use the altar to the north-west. Make sure, however, to become a monkey using a [[greegree]] or you will be trapped by the [[Monkey guard]]s up the ladder. An alternative to using the upstairs altar would be to bring [[Prayer equipment|prayer-boosting gear]] and use [[prayer potion]]s. Remember to bring [[salve amulet]] or [[salve amulet (e)]], as they are undead.
